infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Focus Health Academy needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload a profile picture for your account. This helps personalize your learning experience.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Focus Health Academy needs access to your camera to allow you to take a profile picture for your account. This helps personalize your learning experience.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Focus Health Academy needs permission to save images to your photo library, such as course certificates or educational materials you wish to keep.
